desc: Open the 'Developer Tools URL' path of opera:config, the URL of Dragonfly, in a normal tab, e.g. https://dragonfly.opera.com/app/. This will show a page with an info box 'Waiting for a host connection on port 0'.
Open Dragonfly on that page and delete all values in Storage > Local Storage.
Open the TC and open Dragonfly.
Verify that Dragonfly switches to Scripts and stops at the exception.
label: Default settings.
